special_attacks: powerful charge (gore, 4d6+12), smite good 1/day as a swift action (+0 attack, +5 damage)

sections.body: An ogre destroyer is profane, disgusting, and filled with rage; nothing is safe from his murderous and hateful urges. He indulges every whim, revels in the powers granted by his dark patrons, and lives utterly free of all civilized restraint. He represents what people think of when they hear the word "antipaladin."

name: Fiendish Rhinoceros Companion
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ogres/Example Ogres/Ogre Destroyer/Fiendish Rhinoceros Companion
